game.name: Dead Bit
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fast-paced runner-shooter where every run is a risky raid. Blast through enemies, grab loot, upgrade your weapons and gear, and unlock harder raids with new enemies and tactics each time you reach the end.
